books.author: by James Patterson and Nancy Allen
books.description: Ruby Bozarth defends a college football star charged in a felony case complicated by a second murder.
books.name: JUROR #3

books.author: by Clive Cussler and Boyd Morrison
books.description: Juan Cabrillo and his crew fight two destructive adversaries.
books.name: SHADOW TYRANTS

books.author: by Kevin Kwan
books.description: A New Yorker gets a surprise when she spends the summer with her boyfriend in Singapore.
books.name: CRAZY RICH ASIANS

books.author: by Dean Koontz
books.description: Jane Hawk, a former F.B.I. agent, must stop a secret group using mind-control technology.
books.name: THE FORBIDDEN DOOR

books.author: by J.D. Robb
books.description: Lieutenant Eve Dallas investigates a mysterious act of terror.
books.name: LEVERAGE IN DEATH

books.author: by Kevin Kwan
books.description: The second book in the Crazy Rich Asians trilogy. As her wedding draws near, Rachel Chu discovers her birth father.
books.name: CHINA RICH GIRLFRIEND

books.author: by Heather Morris
books.description: A concentration camp detainee tasked with permanently marking fellow prisoners falls in love with one of them.
books.name: THE TATTOOIST OF AUSCHWITZ

books.author: by Darcey Bell
books.description: A single mother's life is rattled when her best friend disappears.
books.name: A SIMPLE FAVOR

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: The successful son of two Holocaust survivors struggles to become his own person after his marriage falls apart.
books.name: IN HIS FATHER'S FOOTSTEPS

books.author: by Kevin Kwan
books.description: The final book in the Crazy Rich Asians trilogy. Rivalries and jealousies arise among privileged families.
books.name: RICH PEOPLE PROBLEMS

books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: After reconnecting with one of his first students, who is now a billionaire futurist, symbology professor Robert Langdon must go on a perilous quest with a beautiful museum director.
books.name: ORIGIN

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: Amos Decker, known as the Memory Man, puts his talents toward solving a string of murders in a Rust Belt town.
books.name: THE FALLEN

books.author: by Reed Farrel Coleman
books.description: Police chief Jesse Stone works to solve racially motivated crimes and to clear the department's first black female deputy.
books.name: ROBERT B. PARKER'S COLORBLIND

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Gail Honeyman
books.description: A young woman’s well-ordered life is disrupted by the I.T. guy from her office.
books.name: ELEANOR OLIPHANT IS COMPLETELY FINE
